trans-unit.source: Main text: This is the text the user is asked to agree before viewing the video. You can use the placeholder VIDEOPROVIDER which will be replaced with Youtube or Vimeo in the final text. You can use HTML markup here, and must make sure to escape any special HTML characters.
Remember decision text: The text for the remember my decision checkbox. You can use HTML markup here, and must make sure to escape any special HTML characters.

Remember decision for session text: The text for the remember my decision checkbox if the cookie is stored only for the current session. You can use HTML markup here, and must make sure to escape any special HTML characters.
Disable remember me option: If enabled, no remember my decision option will be given to the user. The user has to accept every time.

Days to store remeber me cookie: Only in case remember me option is active. How many days shell the cookie be active. Default is 30 days. Set to 0 to store the cookie only for the current session. Max is 180 days.
Cancel button text: The text for the cancel button. You can use HTML markup here, and must make sure to escape any special HTML characters.
Agree button text: The text for the agree button. You can use HTML markup here, and must make sure to escape any special HTML characters.
Do not add css file: You can copy and adapt Resources/Public/Css/styles.css to your own needs
Start video at time index (seconds). Does not apply for playlists.
Max width in pixel (leave blank for full width)
Additional class for the cancel button
Additional class for the continue button
